column5:
Merge pull request #116 from pgilad/patch-1

Add license attribute

Merge pull request #109 from mmalecki/fix-different-one

[fix] Fix crash when command is empty and app has no usage

[fix] Fix crash when command is empty and app has no usage

    $ bin/bender-cli
    /Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js:230
                  'Cannot find commands for ' + name.magenta
                                                    ^
    TypeError: Cannot read property 'magenta' of undefined
        at loadCommand (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js:230:49)
        at executeCommand (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js:280:26)
        at Object.app.router.notfound (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js:359:5)
        at Router.dispatch (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/director/lib/director/cli.js:50:21)
        at /Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js:87:18
        at onComplete (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/broadway/lib/broadway/app.js:85:5)
        at Object.exports.ensure (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/broadway/lib/broadway/features/index.js:10:10)
        at ensureFeatures (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/broadway/lib/broadway/app.js:91:18)
        at /Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/broadway/node_modules/utile/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:116:25
        at /Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/broadway/node_modules/utile/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:24:16

[fix] Fix a crash when command directory isn't found

Trying to run an empty command with `flatiron.plugins.cli` when the
commands directory wasn't there resulted in the following crash:

    $ bin/bender-cli

    /Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js:201
                  'Cannot find commands for ' + name.magenta
                                                    ^
    TypeError: Cannot read property 'magenta' of undefined
        at loadCommand (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js:201:49)
        at executeCommand (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js:278:26)
        at Object.app.router.notfound (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js:357:5)
        at Router.dispatch (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/director/lib/director/cli.js:50:21)
        at /Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js:87:18
        at onComplete (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/broadway/lib/broadway/app.js:85:5)
        at Object.exports.ensure (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/broadway/lib/broadway/features/index.js:10:10)
        at ensureFeatures (/Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/broadway/lib/broadway/app.js:91:18)
        at /Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/broadway/node_modules/utile/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:116:25
        at /Users/maciej/dev/js/flatiron/node_modules/broadway/node_modules/utile/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:24:16
[fix] Do not crash when using flatiron binary

Merge pull request #93 from Southern/remove-unused

Remove unused code.

Revert "Only require files that end in .js (avoid errors from requiring source map files, for example)"

This reverts commit 7e0b95d935c3b07698bc75f956daac53143a6e40.

This breaks requiring directories.

Merge pull request #87 from julianduque/master

[fix] check for app.config.get('database') in resourceful plugin

Merge pull request #89 from vanthome/patch-1

Update lib/flatiron/plugins/http.js

Merge pull request #103 from ssevertson/only-include-js-files

Only require files that end in .js (avoid errors from requiring source map files, for example)
Only require files that end in .js (avoid errors from requiring source map files, for example)

Merge pull request #101 from gsf/patch-1

Confusing typo there

Merge pull request #98 from flatiron/gh-97

[fix] flatiron cli breaks without command in node 0.10.0
[fix] flatiron cli breaks without command in node 0.10.0

[fix] Handle the user cancelling creation of a scaffold.

This will keep error messages from appearing when `^C` is hit during async prompting.
[minor fix] minor fix in database port :p
[fix] add support for database option in resourceful plugin fixes #72
[minor] Now scaffold inits with union v0.3.5
[fix] Cleaned up examples deps and devDeps
[dist] Version bump, v0.3.0, for API breakage.
[minor] Made options.index and options.dot configurable in static plugin

Merge pull request #77 from odbol/master

Added ability to pass in 'buffer' option to Union when creating via http plugin

Merge pull request #82 from mikl/patch-3

README: Correct order of parameters to app.start().

Correct order of parameters to app.start().

Uses (port, host), not (host, port).

Function signature here: https://github.com/flatiron/flatiron/blob/03d77f3508e2aebf97a5d2334f88246fb352e703/lib/flatiron/plugins/http.js#L39
[minor] Use isaac's st instead of ecstatic

Merge pull request #78 from Southern/flatiron_app_define_property

lib/flatiron.js: Replace deprecated __defineGetter/__defineSetter__
added ability to pass in 'buffer' option to Union when creating via http plugin
[plugins] Removed socket.io plugin for now. It seems easier to just manually setup socket.io
[plugins] First pass at socket.io plugin. Working locally.

Merge pull request #75 from 3rd-Eden/master

[minor] Create the HTTP server before calling app.init

[minor] Create the HTTP server before calling app.init so that broadway plugins can
leverage the `app.server` during the `init` call.
[dist] Bump prompt version to work around https://github.com/joyent/node/issues/3860
[minor] Allow options for director to be set
[test] Stop testing on node v0.6, start testing on node v0.8

Merge pull request #73 from 3rd-Eden/master

[doc] Added more documentation about the `app.config`

[doc] Added more documentation about the `app.config`

As you cannot override configuration using: `app.use(flatiron.plugin.config)` you
need to manually add stores to the configuration instance.
[plugins] [resourceful] Improved error handling for invalid resource paths.
[fix] Fix a small bug in lazy-loading resources
[fix] fs.existsSync is added for 0.8 compatibility, Fixes #71
[docs] Added more documentation on cli commands usage

Merge pull request #69 from flatiron/ecstatic

[api] Added ecstatic plugin to server static assets
[api] Expose app.static which can be used to serve static files
[api] Added ecstatic plugin to server static assets

Merge pull request #68 from egildo/master

Flatiron.js HTTPS server
[minor] Ouput error message when scaffold does not exists, Fixes #55
[minor] Bump union version in http scaffold, Fixes #60

Merge pull request #59 from russfrank/cli-improvements

Prompting for `package.json` fields.
Set cli.notFoundUsage to false to not show `Cannot find module ...`

Merge pull request #62 from flatiron/feature-resource-plugin

[plugins] Added resourceful plugin
[fix] Set the `resourceful` config value in the app from provided options
[test] Added tests for the resourceful plugin
[fix api] Only expose `.define` on the app. Dont require overly deep options to `app.use(flatiron.plugins.resourceful)`
[api] Added resourceful plugin based on feedback from #43.
[refactor] Remove unused config loading code-paths. Added common.tryReaddirSync

Merge pull request #56 from trodrigues/master

Splitting create server logic from inside listen method
[dist] Bump broadway version; version bump v0.1.17
[dist] Bump optimist dependency for boolean options fix.
Removing unnecessary parameters on createServer method.
Split createServer logic from inside listen.

[minor] Update director to 0.1.10  and remove parseBody

This reverts commit 3b3bfb89e71c5c0b240f3d096ee596f952b7d15f.
[api] Implemented cli/create.js using new normalizing method
[fix] Define 'http' namespace on app before mixing it with options
[minor] Set director not to parseBody in http plugin. Only union does it

[minor] Made the options of cli plugin work the same way as http plugin

Before this commit, there was no way for a flatiron plugin to set
the argv or prompt of a cli plugins. Now with the commit, we define
app.cli so that other plugins can set app.cli.argv and app.cli.prompt.

[minor] Start using app.http mixed with options in http plugin

In http plugin, before this commit, if app.http is defined before
the attach is called, then the options passed to attach are
ignored. This commit fixes it by mixing them both by giving
preference to passed options
[minor] Create command can now handle files
[doc] Expanded documentation on app.config, documentation on app.log
[api] Improved argument handling for executeCommand. Exposed executeCommand as cli.executeCommand.
[minor] do not attempt to syntax hilight text output.
[doc] Fix headers for consistency, add an article
[minor doc] Change header to match style of others
[doc] Describe the app container and the http plugin.
[fix] Try to load non-existing subcommand even if command exists
[minor dist refactor] Use `broadway.common` instead of `utile`. Remove unnecessary `utile` dependency
[fix] Hit the callback after showing usage (if appropriate)
[fix] Fix command loading with resource and command parameters
[fix] Improve lazy loading of commands to lazy load if either the resource or command are missing
[api bin] Allow for more liberal usage of `app.alias`. Alias `flatiron create` to `flatiron new`. Fixes #24.
[dist fix] Update api-easy version in http scaffold. Fixes #23
[dist] Roll dependency versions and bump `flatiron` version. 0.1.10.

Pass the app object to commands as context.

This makes it possible for commands residing in their own file to access app.argv amongst other things.
[minor] Update scaffolds to setup app config
[dist api refactor] Improve `flatiron create` command to support both HTTP and CLI apps. Fixes #15

Merge pull request #20 from flatiron/cli-help

Added `help` commands to flatiron.plugins.cli (and some small bugfixes)
[fix] Update commands implementation to return properties of `app.commands` even if `app.source` is not set

Merge pull request #18 from CodeRarity/master

flatiron.plugins.http: Don't `res.emit('next')` if `app.http.onError` is defined
[minor fix] Fix global leak in app template
[minor] Bump up `vows` version in app template

[fix] Fix CLI plugin behavior

`require.resolve` isn't needed here. It's relative to current file
(`lib/flatiron/plugins/cli.js`).
[api] Alias `options.dir` to `options.source` for flatiron.plugins.cli. Allow `options.source` to be a file.
[fix] Only check indexOf name in error on lazy-loaded commands if name exists
[test] Add `.travis.yml` for testing on Travis CI
[api] Use argv and env stores in app.config by default in CLI plugin. Expose `app.help()` from optimist
[test dist] Test if all plugins are there, depend on `vows`

Merge pull request #13 from mikl/patch-1

Check that error message includes the filename we required().

Check that error message includes the filename we required().

This to avoid squelching require() errors in the code we loaded.

[api] Add version printing to `flatiron.plugins.cli`

When `app.version` is specified, CLI plugin is attached with
`version: true` and `-v` or `--version` was passed to the app, print out
`app.version` and exit.

Fixes #12.
[fix minor doc] Fix `flatiron` `require` in the http example
[minor api] Pass default `x-powered-by` header to union@0.1.6 in flatiron.plugins.http
[api] Improve `flatiron create <app-name>` to give more feedback and take the proper arguments
[api fix] Properly pass options to `optimist` for app.argv. Break apart `loadCommand` into two separate operations for proper aliasing in `app.alias`
[fix] Bugfixes to cli plugin that make it work with the included flatiron app (and others)
[api] Expose app.http.onError to the router associated with http apps
[api minor] A couple of minor updates to the core http + cli plugin(s)
[dist] Lock-in to latest versions of all dependencies
[fix] `.mixin` on top of `broadway.common` to ensure getters are copied
[fix] Use JSON.parse to read the right package.json for flatiron version info
[fix] App.prototype.init no longer expects options in any form and delegates directly to broadway.App.prototype.init
[api] Allow for additional options to mixin on calls to App.init()
[minor] Update App.init() to be consistent with broadway

[fix] Print out usage when no `options.dir` is set

Fixes #9.
[bin dist] Remove unnecessary mkdirp dependency in-favor of `broadway.common.*`

Merge pull request #7 from ecto/master

Hanging sugarskull reference

Merge pull request #3 from flatiron/gh-2

[fix] cli plugin throws errors for broken command modules
[fix] cli plugin throws errors for broken command modules
[doc] Flatiron image header and links to 'the big pieces'
[tmpfix] Links to already-written resources about Flatiron in Flatiron's sparse README

Merge pull request #1 from MartinodF/patch-1

[fix] Missing semicolon in variable definitions in the default template
Missing semicolon in variable definitions in the default template
[api minor] Expect the whole options object to be the settings for `union`
[fix] default options in cli plugin to {}
[refactor] Dont include http plugin since it is not used by flatiron itself. Only plugins that are used by flatiron itself should be included in flatiron core.
[api] First pass at pure HTTP-streaming in Flatiron

[api refactor] Update and optimize the `cli` plugin for load time and synchronous feature injection.
[dist refactor] Move config/broadway.json into constants.js
[doc] Update examples/cli-sample
[dist] Add sugarskull as a dependency
[dist] Added a couple of utilities from express
[api] Expose flatiron plugins and hoist up those from broadway
[refactor] Update `cli` plugins to use new `this` context in broadway
[api] First pass at stubbing out `cli` plugin
